text: Nanma is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sarathchandran Wayanad, starring Kalabhavan Mani and Rahman in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3723/malayalam/nanma/1190/review.htm ==Cast== * Kalabhavan Mani * Adithyan * Dhanya Mary Varghese * Rahman * Manikandan * Abhinayashree * Ponnamma Babu ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Nanma
